summary: OUR 1999 PONTIAC MONTANA HAS JUST BEEN WORKED ON BY THE DEALERSHIP FOR A LEAK IN THE LOWER INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKET.  THEY CHARGED ME $795.00 TO FIX THIS LAST WEEK AND NOW IT IS BACK IN THE SHOP TO FIX THE COOLANT SENSOR WHICH WILL COST ANOTHER $175.00.  LAST NIGHT I FOUND OUT THERE IS A PETITION ONLINE WITH OVER 2,500 SIGNATURES ON IT FOR THESE SAME PROBLEMS WITH THEIR GM CAR.  WHY ISN'T THERE A RECALL ON THIS!   *NLM
